players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob was a good man, and I will do everything to find his killer. Alice is the mafioso, we have to be careful."
You: "I will remain silent and observe. The mafioso might be Charlie or Diana, as I didn't say anything last night."
Charlie: "Bob's death is a tragedy, and I want to find the killer. Diana has spoken out in support of Bob, but Alice remains silent. We need to discuss our next move."
